siteInfo.name: Arkann Academy
siteInfo.description: A learning center designed for homeschooled kids to help them master their grade level in an Islamic environment.

hero.headline: A Learning Center Where Faith, Character, and Academic Excellence Grow Together
hero.subheadline: Supporting homeschooled students with skilled educators and enrichment activities in an Islamic environment

whoIsArkannFor.header: Arkann Is For Homeschool Families Who…
points: Value character and adab as much as academics
Want personalized attention and flexible learning
Believe faith should be lived daily, not added on
Prefer depth over speed, mastery over pressure
whoIsArkannFor.disclaimer: Arkann is designed for homeschool families who seek enrichment rooted in purpose and character.
rightBoxPoints: We provide 1-1 tutoring and personalized support
Small group sizes ensure every child is known
Islamic values are woven into daily learning
Flexible approach that honors each family's homeschool journey

differentiators.title: Small by Design
differentiators.description: Limited enrollment ensures every child is seen, supported, and guided daily.

differentiators.title: Personalized Learning
differentiators.description: Students progress at their own pace with teacher guidance—not comparison.

differentiators.title: Faith as Foundation
differentiators.description: Islamic values are woven into daily life, not confined to a single class period.

parentConcerns.header: We Understand What Parents Are Worried About
parentConcerns.body:
Many families come to Arkann feeling torn between academic excellence and preserving their child's faith, confidence, and emotional well-being.

Arkann was created so parents no longer have to choose.

ctaSection.header: Ready to learn more about Arkann?
ctaSection.body: We welcome homeschool families who value character, individualized attention, and an Islamic environment to reach out and learn more.

faqs.question: Is Arkann Academy a private school?
faqs.answer: No, Arkann is a learning center that falls under the Prenda umbrella of homeschooling centers around the United States.

faqs.question: What is Arkann?
faqs.answer: Arkann is a learning center designed for homeschooled kids to help them master their grade level in an Islamic environment. We love the flexibility of homeschooling and help parents by providing enrichment activities to keep students engaged in learning with skilled educators.

faqs.question: What is Prenda?
faqs.answer: Prenda is a homeschooling curriculum provider that focuses on building character while kids master curriculum based on the child's individual needs. Prenda individualizes the learning path for every student based on their grade level. Arkann is a Prenda learning hub.

faqs.question: What kind of support does Arkann provide?
faqs.answer: Arkann provides 1-1 tutoring whenever necessary for the child, enrichment activities, and a supportive Islamic environment where character and academics grow together.

faqs.question: How is faith integrated at Arkann?
faqs.answer: Faith at Arkann is lived daily. Islamic values, adab, and character development are woven naturally into the learning environment, alongside Qur'an, Arabic, and Islamic Studies.

faqs.question: What grades does Arkann serve?
faqs.answer: Arkann currently serves students in grades 3rd through 8th.

faqs.question: Does Arkann provide math tutoring?
faqs.answer: Yes, Arkann provides hourly math tutoring for students enrolled in FLVS Flex math courses, including Geometry, Algebra, Pre-Algebra, and Pre-Calculus.

faqs.question: How do I learn more about Arkann?
faqs.answer: Contact us by email at contact@arkann.org or call 561-376-2257 to discuss your child's needs and learn more about our programs.

faqs.question: Where is Arkann located?
faqs.answer: Arkann is located at 3480 NW 5th Ave., Boca Raton, FL 33431.

about.mission: Arkann is a learning center designed for homeschooled kids to help them master their grade level in an Islamic environment. We love the flexibility of homeschooling and help parents by providing enrichment activities to keep students engaged in learning with skilled educators.
about.vision: We envision children who grow with knowledge, character, and faith—supported by individualized attention and a strong Islamic foundation.
about.story: Arkann Academy was founded out of a deep conviction that children thrive when education is calm, intentional, and rooted in values. After years of observing the gap between academic rigor and character development, Arkann was created to offer a small, purpose-driven environment where both are nurtured together.

academics.philosophy: Personalized, skill-based learning that supports each child's unique pace and needs.
academics.approach: Prenda is a homeschooling curriculum provider that Arkann falls under. Prenda focuses on building character while kids master homeschooling curriculum based on the child. Prenda draws the path and individualizes the year for every student based on their grade level. Arkann is a Prenda learning hub that provides 1-1 tutoring whenever it is necessary for the child.

assessment.philosophy: Mastery and growth through individualized support
progressSupports: Regular parent updates on student progress

quran.approach: Recitation based on student level. Hifz encouraged for those already in a hifz program.

islamicStudies: 500 words that make 75% of the Quran ?
islamicProgram.faithIntegration: Faith at Arkann is lived, not added on. Islamic values, adab, and reflection are woven naturally into daily routines, conversations, and relationships.

process: Contact us by email or phone

staff.name: Hanan Khalil

staff.bio: Holds a degree in Islamic Studies and a Bachelor of General Studies with a minor in Business Management. Completed Qur'an Hifz program.

staff.name: Danna Elzagha
staff.title: Lead Instructor
staff.credentials: K-5 Certified, Upper School Math & Science Certified

staff.name: Layann Abdallah
staff.title: Instructor
staff.credentials: Education Major Graduate, Upper School Math Teaching Certified

invitationRequest.subject: Inquiry about Arkann Learning Center
invitationRequest.body:
Assalamu Alaikum,

I am writing to learn more about Arkann Learning Center.

My child is ___ years old and currently in ___ grade. We are homeschooling and seeking support through enrichment activities, tutoring, and an Islamic environment.

After learning about Arkann, we feel it may be a good fit for our family, and we would appreciate the opportunity to discuss this further.

Thank you for your time.

Sincerely,
[Parent Name]
[Child's Name]
[Phone Number]

seo.title: Arkann Academy | Learning Center for Homeschooled Students in Boca Raton, FL
seo.description: A learning center for homeschooled students in an Islamic environment. Providing 1-1 tutoring, enrichment activities, and character development for grades 3-8 in Boca Raton.
